name: La Quinta Inn Baton Rouge University Area

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I'm at the New Orleans Marriot on Canal Street tonight but know I got a much better deal last night at the La Quinta in Baton Rouge. 1/4 the price, room was just as clean and the breakfast saved us a stop at Mickey D's and avoided the grease. Towels were a little thin, but if that was my biggest complaint at $50 a night, I've got it pretty good. :-) I usually use my Verizon modem, but did hook up to their wifi without a password and it was fast and easy. We'll be stopping here next time too. Easy access to I-10, good restaurants close by, cheap, clean and everyone was real friendly too.
reviews.title: Best Motel for the Money in a LONG time!
where's my wifi?
reviews.text: We found the room to be comfortable and the desk staff knowledgeable.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Quiet, clean, comfortable

reviews.text: Not once over 20 hours were we able to log into the internet.
reviews.title: Dirty Sheets

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There are some excellent restaurants within a short distance.
reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised

reviews.text: The people who worked here were very nice and the bed and pillows were comfortable. Our tv didn't work and they offered to put us in another room but we were right on an end away from the freeway so we decided we would stay and not watch tv.
reviews.title: If you don't like smoke don't stay here

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I could hear people in a room around us but the worst part was that I woke up around 2 am and went to the rest room and I was inhaling smoke coming through the vent from another room. My throat was a bit swollen from this but who wants to change rooms at 2am...
reviews.title: Gotta be a better place for LSU Games!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: After that I don't recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Unless You Are a Frat Boy, Don't

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had the rooms transferred to us as part of an Auburn/LSU game package that our friend could not attend. If we had it to do over again - we would NOT pick this motel.
reviews.title: Stayed for LSU Game

reviews.text: There is a reason I spent only $60 for my night here. The room was basic but functional. The bathroom was clean but needed to be renovated. The breakfast was basic, but I found something to eat (yogurt).
reviews.title: You get what you pay for

reviews.text: My biggest complaint is that the advertised wi-fi worked in my room at night but not in the morning. I did get wi-fi in the lobby, so it wasn't a major hassle.
reviews.title: GROSS!!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here on 3/10/12. It was so gross. There were red stains all down the mattress to the floor and on the floor. It looked like someone threw up big red or maybe blood who knows. There was an awful smell of urine when you walked in. We found dog food behind the bathroom door, so I guess the dog peed all over. So obviously it wasn't cleaned since the last people were their. It was so dirty that we kept our clothes on and did not sleep in the covers and just got up early and left.We are a family of 4 and no one would even take a shower it was so dirty. The bathroom door wouldn't even close and there were holes in the wall where someone punched it. We told the management and they said oh we are so sorry that is not our standards. That is not true, this is a dive and I have never stayed in such a dirty filthy hotel room. I was so worried we were going to catch something we couldn't get rid of. I can not even describe how disgusting this place was!!!!! RUN AWAY DON'T STAY HERE!!!!!
reviews.title: Wonderful night's sleep

reviews.text: I was recently driving from Texas to Florida for a relocation and stopped in Baton Rouge overnight on my drive. I will admit that I have not stayed at a LaQuinta in some time, but from what I had read online, I thought that they had recently updated all of their properties. Their advertising campaign made me think that I would be pleased with a stay at LaQuinta.
reviews.title: Disappointed - Would Not Recommend

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: While this property is not TERRIBLE, I would not stay there again. The check-in process was great, and the staff very friendly.
reviews.title: ughh ew.

reviews.text: The room on the other hand...first of all, the room appeared to be ok upon walking in, but it was the bathroom and other amenities that told the real story. Not to mention there was a very strange odor in the room. I couldn't quite put my finger on it.
reviews.title: Bit worn down, but good value and friendly staff. Would stay there again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The bathroom was very disappointing. The toilet bowl had very bad dark stains, and did not appear to be clean, even though I have no doubt it had been cleaned. The bath tub was in bad shape, and the vanity mirror was very old and had chipping and a rust-like substance around the sides.
reviews.title: Moldy

reviews.text: The other item which really bothered me was the television remote control. The buttons barely functioned, and it was not a battery issue. When I pressed the channel up or down buttons the channels moved up, regardless of which button I pushed. Even more frustrating was the fact that the volume buttons controlled the channels as well. Normally I would have complained and asked for a new remote or to be moved to another room, however I had been driving all day, had just showered and settled in to bed, so I was in no mood to walk back to the office or change rooms.
reviews.title: This hotel is extremely too expensive for the service that we received and I will never stay her again.

aka: La Quinta Inn Baton Rouge Hotel
